revision.text: ==English== {{wp}} ===Etymology=== From {{der|en|ang|ēa||river, stream}} + {{m|ang|tūn||enclosure; settlement, town}}. ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun|~|Yeatons}} # {{place|en|village|par/Baschurch|co/Shropshire|cc/England}} {{q|[[OS]] grid ref SJ432194}}. # {{surname|en|[[habitational]]|from=Old English}}. ====Statistics==== * According to the 2010 United States Census, ''Yeaton'' is the 21717<sup>th</sup> most common surname in the United States, belonging to 1198 individuals. ''Yeaton'' is most common among White (91.82%) individuals. ===Further reading=== * {{R:en:DAFN}}
